EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Opt-In Email.Opt-in Batch Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting the Honeywell HGuide Team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in Honeywell’s HGuide Team.
Did you get the information you were looking for? We want to make sure you receive the necessary resources to answer your questions and help you be successful using our products.
To improve your experience and to make sure you get the latest information, we’d like to remind you to opt-in <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HGuide-sign-up.html]]> if you’d like to receive updates about our offerings, special offers, news and events. If not, that’s okay, too.
We look forward to helping you find the right product to meet your needs.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team Opt-In Here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HGuide-sign-up.html]]>
